alert.note: Alert for Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:23PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Multiple strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Choctaw, northwestern Washington, southeastern Wayne and northeastern Greene Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated multiple strong thunderstorms developing over portions of southwestern Choctaw, northwestern Washington, southeastern Wayne and northeastern Greene Counties. Storms are generally moving southwest at around 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waynesboro, Chatom, Millry, State Line, Buckatunna and Silas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
